content: This is something we need to ask everyone we know who voted for Trump — “how do you feel about Trump’s support of white supremacist groups?” I, for one, expect to hear a lot of “well, I only voted for Trump because I would never vote for Hillary.” OK — but Hillary never supported white supremacist groups in any way, shape, or form. And I have to question the American values of anyone who does. ANY support of white supremacist groups should have been a deal-breaker from the get-go.
